dialogue: Hello Bob, I'm Azeala. Watch out! Some boars are about to attack you. I know you're new to your levantic powers, so let me quickly tell you how to use them. Press <space> to jump, <w> to open the menu, <esc> to exit the menu, <enter> to talk to npcs (although you probably already knew that), <x> to shoot magic fireballs, and <c> to shoot coins. go kill some boars, and then go through the teleporter (that will unlock when you finish my quest) and find me in Levanter's Keep. Copolla?

Nice to see you again Bob. I'm glad you were able to deal with those boars (with my help of course). I'm sorry for your loss. I know you must be devestated that everyone you've ever known, with the exception of your loyal friend Bucky was just murdered. You must be wondering why. I think that you should go attack some of the unicorns that were attacking your village, and see if they know anything about why your village was murdered.

Hmmm, you found out from attacking the unicorns that they were led by a Kirin to attack your village? I know only one person that Kirin's work for: Malimost. Yes that's right. You want revenge for your village's murder? Kill the Kirin. It will be dangerous though, you'll want to talk to mercury first to get some weapons.

bear.dialogue: Hi, I'm Mercury. I'll sell you some equipment to get you prepared for your fight.

dawg.dialogue: ive got nothing to say to you, except Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
